pullrequest.title: Account for inter-component dependencies when importing targets

content.raw: This looks great; I just added some documentation to the `README.md` of the new examples, and added a 3rd example that only specifies the `child` component to `ign_find_package` to confirm that it will find all needed components even if they aren't explicitly listed because this is one of the other aspects of the bug listed in #48
content.html: This looks great; I just added some documentation to the README.md of the new examples, and added a 3rd example that only specifies the child component to ign_find_package to confirm that it will find all needed components even if they aren't explicitly listed because this is one of the other aspects of the bug listed in #48
